main event: A bright white light was observed moving from NE to SE at about 3000 ft altitude, changing course several times and disappearing at high speed.
interesting points: Multiple credible witnesses, including a senior master sergeant and an Air Force captain, were present during the sighting.
The sighting occurred at Otis Air Force Base in Massachusetts.
The object was observed moving at a high altitude of 3000 ft.
The UFO changed course several times, indicating controlled movement.
The UFO disappeared at high speed, suggesting advanced technology.
witnesses: Walter C. Krebs (SMSGT), Capt. Turner, and 5 other Air Force personnel
